text: Mackwiller is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Bas-Rhin department in northeast France. == Archaeology == In 1955, substantial remains of a large Mithraeum were unearthed in Mackwiller by Jean-Jacques Hatt, archaeologist and director of the Musée archéologique de Strasbourg.Découverte d'un sanctuaire de Mithra à Mackwiller (Bas-Rhin) The find has since been displayed at museum. == References == Category:Communes in Bas-Rhin
title: Mackwiller
